name: WATCH OUT (itch) (nonedoe)
description:
UPDATE: WebGL now working

My first attempt at Trijam. Did not go so well, haha. Better next time ;)

Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move

ESC - Quit

Gameplay

The great eye is looking for you, but it can only see you on white background. Try to evade it.

What's missing

The player would have to make one revolution counter-clockwise to make the eye close. It will then re-open with two pupils that can spot you. That would have continued up to ~5 pupils. After the final revolution the eye would close for good.

Also, UI, my kryptonite. And SFX.

Credits

Acherus Grotesque Regular
